title: Looking for a support player Silver - Plat.
body:
Im a new ADC main who considers himself to be "Pretty" good.
Im looking for good support players who preferrably mains:
{{champion:53}}  {{champion:201}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:143}} 

These supports in my opinion goes pretty well within Jhin.

Chuck me an add and we can trial game a few times.

Cheers.
